artist: Painter: After Diego Rodriguez Velazquez; Engraver: Alexander Bannerman; Publisher: John Boydell
description: Saint Joseph on his death bed with Mary on the left with her head on pillow, crying; Jesus on right speaking to Joseph
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: Velasco Pinxit   Ale\'r Bannerman Sculpsit / THE DEATH OF SAINT JOSEPH / From the Original Picture Painted by Velasco in the Collection of the Rt. title: The Death of Saint Joseph
